name: Sweet Love
description:
A game from the Nuances series, games with a deeper message about feminism or LGBT issues.

Commitment

Sweet Love is about important feminist issues that can be hard. If you feel the need to communicate after finishing the game, do not hesitate to contact us or to contact the relevant associations directly.

All profits will be donated to Women In Games Fr.

The game

Pick up items, complete chores, achieve life goals, run and avoid obstacles to complete the 20 levels in this intense short adventure.

A game you can complete in 15mn, with a message you can carry through a lifetime.
